attributes.action: Extend the requirement that all skilled workers entering Britain from outside the EU being required to be proficient in English equivalent to GCSE level to apply to non EU non-working spouses?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How else can their spouses possibly integrate or contribute in a positive way to society?  This petition is more direct on a sepcific issue and is remotely overlapping or similar.
